🌟 Unite, Expand, and Lead with Paragon! 🌟

Are you a Backend Software Developer ready to embark on an extraordinary journey in the world of web3? Paragon is on a quest to co-author new realities with NFT communities, and we need YOU! 🔗 <https://lnkd.in/ePbe765>

Join our vibrant collective of visionaries spanning two continents, all dedicated to unlocking the true potential of NFTs through peer-to-peer lending. Our team consists of experts in finance, creative production, and blockchain development, working tirelessly to make the metaverse accessible to all. 🌐

Learn more about our mission and the incredible people behind Paragon in this insightful Medium article: <https://medium.com/@FindTheParagon/paragon-papers-12-29-4a21382bb6e4>

Don't miss your chance to be a part of our Virtuous Vanguard! 💫

#hiring #NFTcommunity #NFTs #findtheparagon
Can you rewrite more casually and wormly and tone down the salesmanship?

Hey there! 👋 Are you a Backend Software Developer with a passion for web3 and NFTs? We'd love to meet you! Paragon is looking for someone like you to help us build a platform that supports the creation of new NFT experiences. Come join our team! 🔗 <https://lnkd.in/ePbe765>

Our friendly collective of collectors from two continents includes experts in finance, creative production, and blockchain development. We're all excited about making a difference in the NFT space through peer-to-peer lending. 🌐

Curious about who we are and what we stand for? Check out this Medium article for an inside look at our team: <https://medium.com/@FindTheParagon/paragon-papers-12-29-4a21382bb6e4>

Let's create something amazing together! ✨
